post.body: Happy New Year to you too! Enjoy the new naked friends! *goes to watch The Full Monte* LOL!
Hey, when you were talking about the naked Burger King, did you get a bunch of naked followers??
Paranoia, huh? You're not sure what's ok to click on and what's not (like the fabric, btw)
Oh, nice....so I'm chopped liver??
eggs and grapefruit? ewww....sounds like an awful diet. Tried Atkins for a week once...was almost homicidal before I'd had it
it was probably for a bandaid : )
aaagghhh! I got logged off Etsy for some reason and I can't sign back in...even rebooting didn't help
Oh that's a bit scary...hopefully nothing major happens. Perhaps it's entertainment for the rest of them? : )
Do your neighbors try to set fire to the house often?
So what does my Krispy Kreme "you'll know by the glow" shirt mean for me? More donuts? : )
Welcome : ) the pork rub sounds interesting....I suck at bbq-ing though, the family is forbidden to mention the brisket incident
LOL....sounds like quite an incident. I'm sure it will go down in history : )
Argh...the phishing scam continues...got DM from @Felt4Ewe - if you're out there, check your account
Had ham loaf for lunch today...mmm. Went to church later so had lunch out instead of breakfast as we usually do.
Oh, I've see the warning link now...what creeps think up this scam crappola?
Another Saturday morning...got the boy on the train back to Brooklyn. And just managed to haul the trash out before the truck got here.
It's another one of those days - mom is majorly agitated. How to explain that we don't wipe off the trash can with an old butter wrapper?
Aaaggghh! For some reason, Etsy randomly logged me out...when I sign in again - it doesn't do anything, won't log me in. What's up?
I'm not sure there's enough caffeine here to get me moving today. Lots of stuff to do - and the in-laws are coming by this evening. Argh.
Look at this precious little face... http://www.flickr.com/photos/avocadocreations/3157705543/
